title: Story of a Stolen Heir. A novel
author: Bertram, James Glass.
snippet: The suite of apartments occupied by LadyBarnton was fitted up with the most exquisite taste. In Ramsay House, it was called"The Blue and Silver Suite." The whole ofthe rooms, which were on the ground floor,were oval in shape, and communicated onewith the other.

title: Story of a Stolen Heir. A novel
author: Bertram, James Glass.
snippet: It is for you to determine, Lady Barnton. I either leave Ramsay House your foe, oryour friend and—agent. Reflect for a moment.

title: Story of a Stolen Heir. A novel
author: Bertram, James Glass.
snippet: Ramsay House, which was her dowry residence, is unsurpassed in the richness of itsfurniture and in those gorgeous and costlyfittings which mark the home of wealth andtaste. In extent it is a palace, and is builtin one of the finest parks in the world.
